# Copilot design toolkit (resources + links)

The [Copilot design toolkit](https://microsoft.sharepoint.com/teams/bap-design/SitePages/Copilot-design-toolkit.aspx?&sdata=bHBZS21WdlREbktRNmNhTVdmVWRDYlE3S2o3SXU0dG53ZGs1T0RWNnFrdz0%3D&ovuser=72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47%2Ckylieh%40microsoft.com&OR=Teams-HL&CT=1680049632001&clickparams=eyJBcHBOYW1lIjoiVGVhbXMtRGVza3RvcCIsIkFwcFZlcnNpb24iOiIyNy8yMzAzMDUwMTExMCIsIkhhc0ZlZGVyYXRlZFVzZXIiOmZhbHNlfQ%3D%3D) page of Business Applications' Product Design team site curates and categorizes Copilot AI product-making resources and links from across Microsoft.
